src:
O oskrbi Istre s pitno vodo
05 Nov 2019, 14:14 by Uredništvo

Stranka Dobra država bo danes ob 17. uri organizirala okroglo mizo o reševanju problema oskrbe slovenske Istre s pitno vodo.



Foto: Petra Vidrih

KOPER > Po razlitju kerozina v bližini vodnega zajetja je državna politika medijsko podprla vse projekte, premaknilo pa se ni veliko, čeprav je voda strateška dobrina, ki jo je potrebno bolje upravljati.
V zeleni dvorani Obrtno-podjetniške zbornice Koper na Staničevem trgu bodo mnenja izmenjali dr. Milan Krek, predstojnik Nacionalnega instituta za javno zdravje, območna enota Koper, dr. Bojan Dobovšek, predsednik Dobre države, in Zlatko Gombar, predsednik mestnega odbora te stranke v Kopru.
text:
About the supply of Istria with drinking water
05 Nov 2019, 14:14 by Uredništvo

The Good State party will organize a roundtable today at 5 pm on solving the problem of supplying Slovenian Istria with drinking water.



Photo: Petra Vidrih

KOPER> After the spill of kerosene near the water intake, state policy has supported all the projects in the media, but not much has moved, although water is a strategic asset that needs to be better managed.
In the green hall of the Chamber of Craft and Small Business in Koper on Stanic Square, dr. Milan Krek, Head of the National Institute of Public Health, Koper Regional Unit, dr. Bojan Dobovsek, President of the Good Country, and Zlatko Gombar, President of the Koper City Committee.
